verbs.description: you [V: may] soon have to slow down on some charlotte roads here why to make neighborhood streets safer for residents the charlotte city council is considering a policy that would lower speed limits and make it easier to request four - way stops and speed bumps the changes reviewed monday at city council transportation and planning committee could make it safer for people to walk and bike in charlotte neighborhoods a car speed is one of the most crucial factors affecting how badly pedestrians are hurt in a wreck city staff said a pedestrian hit at 20 mph has a charlotte tamara blue director independence boulevard neighborhood services department city council charlotte north carolina charlotte department of transportation charlotte mecklenburg police department danny pleasant transportation and planning committee moores chapel road portillo charlotte city council larken egleston charlotte - mecklenburg police department
